cont.entity_a: The camera has capabilities similar to modern cell phones in harsh lighting conditions.
It has the heft needed for sharp photos at a tenth of a second.
The APS C sensor makes it one of the best 6MP cameras.
cont.entity_b: The Kodak KAF8300CE CCD chip provides high performance.

cont.entity_a: Compatible with old film AF lenses and manual lenses; manual mode is necessary for non-AF lenses but the focus indicator still works.
The color capture sensor is accurate and matches well with the Fuji Frontier printer.
The CF card holder can crack, so images are downloaded via USB.
Lasting for weeks.
Solid and functional body with no video features.
cont.entity_b: The rubber-coated aluminum chassis and smooth-working controls are appealing.

cont.entity_a: The D70S is easy to use with many features and accepts almost all Nikon lenses.
cont.entity_b: The E-300 is intuitive and easy to use. The camera is easy to learn and operate.

cont.entity_a: Low noise at ISO 200 and synchronizes to 1/500 sec in flash mode.
Image quality is crisp and clear.
Withstanding up to 63,000 shutter counts.
cont.entity_b: Built tough and feels good to hold.

cont.entity_a: The D70S is a good entry-level DSLR, easy to use with a lot of options.
cont.entity_b: The camera is very suitable for those new to digital SLRs.

cont.entity_a: 6.1MP is sufficient for most needs.
The camera arrived in good condition, matching the description. The camera was in excellent condition, with no scratches or scuff marks.
Offers great value for money.
cont.entity_b: Good price for the features offered.

cont.entity_a: The camera and lens arrived in well-protected packaging. The camera was properly and safely packed.
Hardware and software functioned as described in the manual.
cont.entity_b: The camera can be finicky and difficult to focus in imperfect lighting. Automatic settings result in poorly lit and blurry pictures.

cont.entity_a: The camera is dependable and well-made, suitable for beginners.
cont.entity_b: The camera is good for novices and professionals.

cont.entity_a: The camera is easy to use and has a lot of manual settings.

cont.entity_b: The camera has a powerful flash.

cont.entity_a: The camera is a good starter for digital photography.
cont.entity_b: The camera is suitable for astrophotography.

cont.entity_a: Well-built with a strong body.

cont.entity_b: The viewfinder is dim, and focusing can be tricky with included lenses.
